page.title: 09TRANSPORT/LEISURE
page.content: {RELATES TO SQUARES 2 & 6 OF ITEM COUNT THE MAJOR TRANSPORT FEATURE OF THESE TWO SQUARES IS THE{CROOKED BILLET} ROUNDABOUT WHICH TRIES FOR THE MOST PART WITH MODERATE SUCCESS TO ALLOW TRAFFIC TO FLOW EAST/WEST(THIS BEING THE{NORTH CIRCULAR ROAD}MENTIONED ELSWHERE) AND THE BUSY FLOW OF TRAFFIC {NORTH/SOUTH(CHINGFORD/WALTHAMSTOW)}THE ROUNDABOUT HAS BEEN EAR-MARKED FOR A FLYOVER(E-W) IN ORDER TO EASE THE APPALLING JAMS WHICH OCCUR DAILY AT RUSH HOUR. JUST OFF THE ROUNDABOUT THERE IS THE {WALTHAMSTOW GREYHOUND STADIUM}KNOWN A {"THE STOW".}IT IS ONE OF THE PRINCIPAL {GREYHOUND}STADIA IN THE COUNTRY AND ONE OF ONLY A HANDFUL LEFT IN THE {GREATER LONDON}AREA. IT EMPLOYS 60 PEOPLE FULL-TIME AND ABOUT 280 PEOPLE PART-TIME.THE AVERAGE WEEKLY ATTENDANCE IS 7,500 AND IT HAS AN
